forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm during the morning, then some lingering showers still possible this afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming more intermittent for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low 9C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low 49F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with occasional rain. High 11C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 52F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with scattered showers and thunderstorms during the evening becoming more widespread overnight. Low 8C. Winds W at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and thundershowers in the evening, then variable clouds overnight with still a chance of showers. Low 46F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 52F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain tapering to a few showers late. High 9C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady light rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High near 50F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 43F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds NE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 52F. Winds NE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 40F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 54F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 39F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High near 55F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 41F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 13C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High near 55F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 42F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 14C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 57F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
